name: Solitaire (itch) (LordHill)
description:
A Simple 2D Game Of Solitaire.

Objective is to jump over other marbles. if you can no longer jump, you lose. You win by landing your final marble in the center, but consider a single marble a victory lol.

SpaceBar to reset (On Windows)

Android is being worked on, but is fully playable in its current state!
